name: WONDER POT
description:
Texas Holdem is widely known and played around the world.
Are you tired of existing poker games? Then try WONDERPOT Texas Holdem.
You can enjoy the various modes of Texas Holdem games for free.
In addition, the club mode in WONDERPOT Texas Holdem will bring you deep fellowship and competitive spirit.

[Key Features]
* A bunch of bonus chips with just log-in after download !!
* Participate and show your skill in large-scale online tournaments which the more users are, the greater rewards are.
* Various game modes such as classic Holdem mode, VS mode, Wonder pot tournament, and Special tournament will give you satisfying all your tastes.
* Challenge various events by winning prizes in tournaments!!!
* Daily bonus chips and lots of events bonus are waiting for you.
* WONDERPOT Texas Holdem analyzes your play style and informs you of your play preferences. You can check it on your profile, and it will help you in your play.
* WONDERPOT Club Event : You can create or join a club at WONDERPOT Texas Holdem. You can challenge various events through in-game club activities and can get rewards through the challenge.
* Wants to play with your friends? You can create your own private table to play with your friends. Invite your friends to play anytime, anywhere.
* You can play with the same ID on various devices such as PC, mobile phones, and tablets.
* For fair game play, WONDERPOT Texas Holdem has tested and certified its shuffling algorithm at iTech Labs.

[]
This application is for entertainment purposes only and is intended for adults over the age of 21.
* Practicing or winning in social casino and poker games does not mean future success in real money gambling.
* This application does not offer real money gambling or the opportunity to win real money, a prize.
* You need to pay for in-game purchasing.
